betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Some crushed or purified gem dusts will need to be sifted to get gems or actual gem dusts.  One example that needs this process is diamonds.  You will need a diamond gem for some of the ore processing machines.  If you are not lucky enough to get one from a small diamond ore block, you will need to do manual sifting.
§d§b
Tip:  It is not always beneficial to sift all gem ores.  It depends on the ore and what gems or dusts you need.

Note:  Greg built an auto-clicker into the sifter so as long as you stand there it will right click for you.  Just keep a stack of the items you want to shift in your hand.  Also have a hopper under the shifter and connected to a chest so the results of the sifter have a place to go.
§f§a
To complete this quest you need to craft:
1 Sifting Table
